Reseña del libro "Ayurveda Cooking for Beginners: An Ayurvedic Cookbook to Balance and Heal (libro en Inglés)" Bring balance to your body with nourishing Ayurvedic cooking for beginners The ancient science of Ayurveda is a powerful system of holistic wellness, and its philosophy of balance is more relevant than ever today since stress is a common cause disease. This Ayurvedic cookbook is your introduction to practicing principles in kitchen. It's packed with cooking techniques and recipes that healing. Discover an overview of Ayurveda, from its history to the present day. Find out how to identify your dosha, or body type, based on its dominant recipes to help you correct imbalances within yourself with food that is fresh, seasonal, and appropriate for your type--so you can rediscover inner power, and inherent peace. Ayurvedic eating, a quiz to find out your dosha, follow along with a to a wide for every body type and season, including modification template meal plan for each season, along with a handy shopping list.
